summary: This adds an elven sword in the chamber with Auriel\\\'s bow. the sword has the same enchantment as the bow.
descriptionHtml:
This adds an elven sword in the chamber with Auriel\\\'s bow. the sword has the same enchantment as the bow. this is aimed at warriors that have a low archery skill, but still want to play through the dawnguard storyline.

These are the changes to the sword.
Increase damge by 9
Reduced weight by 8
Increase speed by .5

This is untested at it\'s current location. I tested out the sword in a different esp to see if it works, but I\\\'m no where near this point the quest.

This needs Dawnguard. you will still need to take the bow and use it if you want to fire at the sun or continue the quest.

It will use what ever texture you have for an elven sword, so if you use one of these http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7510  -  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/309 it will have that texture. I have not and most likely will not make a custom texture for this.

Note: the files say 1.3 because I thought it was 1.3, but it\'s only 1.2, so ignore that little mix up.

Version 1.2
    changed name from Sun hollowed sword to Auriel\\\'s sword 

Version 1.1
    added more details to readme and re-uploaded 

Version 1.0
    first upload
author: bwins95
